Reviews.Title: Tivax MiTraveler does a great job
Reviews.Author: T. Hogan "tshogan"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice size Tablet, review is for 8" in case Amazon lumps them together.  It is my second Tablet (I have a first gen Kindle Fire) but I am also an IT professional with a background of PC repair and networking, soPicture: (10/10)  Nice resolution and color is excellent.  Watched videos from Netflix and added my favorite android games I was using on my phone.  They looked great.  Added the Kindle app also.Sound: (8/10)  Most tablets are not known for their speaker output and this is similar to the Kindle first generation sound.  Also it only has one speaker so if you want that stereo sound, use the headphones.  The ones I have sounded excellent.Book/Reading: (9/10)  The Kindle fire app does the job and the pages look great.  Would rate this about where the Kindle fire looks but not the book reading Kindle.  Still a great job and no problems here.  Same as other tablets for reading in bright sunlight, not very wellWeb Browsing: (9/10)  This one has flash capabilities and uses Opera and Google Chrome.  Some issues with clicking on small print and where you click is not always what you get.  I have not seen where you can calibrate this but I would give my Kindle Fire an 8.App Availability: (8/10)  So far I cannot seem to get my Amazon app store and Android has fewer apps than the IPad, but there are plenty to choose from and seem to be more free apps than the IPhone/IPad.Look/Feel: (10/10) Light, thin, sleek.  What you would expect from a high end tabletThe accessories are the power charger, a usb connector which does a trickle charge, and a mini to usb port adapter to connect a usb memory stick or external hard drive.Overall: (54/60).Note:  Getting some errors with updating and error with google apps out of the box.  Hopefully their support will help with these issues.  Lots of potential in this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations!! ((Ipad Mini for Android))
Reviews.Author: Amazonian Lavor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for only $99 on Prime, looking for a tablet for use in college. I saw the Ipad Mini in Best Buy, and I loved the form factor,but I didn't want to spend $300. However, I am very familiar with the Android System (Droid Razr Maxx phone) and wanted a "pure Android" device. So this tablet seemed to have what I was looking for: Sleek Style, An updated (& stable) version of Android, and an awesome price.CASE: B00CF1ITJ6(Fits perfectly! This device matches the Archos 80, so those cases work)PROS:Display-True HD, can't really be seen on the home screen or app drawer, but more in movies, youtube, and browsingDesign- Ipad Mini, simply beautifulSystem- Android 4.2 with Google Play. Every App I have tested works well.Battery- Lasts maybe 4 hours with constant use, great standby time (days with no use)Bluetooth- Can be used with a bluetooth speaker or keyboardCONS:Security Lock- Missing from the settings menu, however it can be set! Using an app called QuickShortCutMaker (Settings/ Unlock Selection)I noticed a slight lag while downloading many apps, and running another app.Suggestions:Go to settings, then developer options and-Force GPU rendering-Check mark-Window Animation Scale- Animation off-Transition Animation Scale-Animation offFor school:I convert powerpoint presentations to PDF Files (using an app) and then open using Adobe Reader. Then I can write and take notes on powerpointOverall, this tablet is excellent! Even better if you are familiar with the Android System, I suggest watching Youtube videos on Android 4.2. I can do everything on this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Fast, Lightweight, Easy to use, HD Screen
Reviews.Author: Simon H
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who wanted a tablet below $200. When it arrived I had it for 2 days to download the apps he wanted and test it out.I have Samsung Tab 2, but this one here is very fast and easy to use. The screen is very good HD. The battery lasted a while and the wifi seemed fast with my internet.The only BAD THING if there is one, I went to the Google Play store and went download a number of apps and had a big list waiting to download. I left it on and went out thinking when I came back it would be finished but I came home 2 hours later and it had not downloaded anything while I was gone. It seemed like when it turned the screen off and locked it's self it stopped downloading everything. Very weird.But for a cheap tablet to use for going on the internet and play games and music etc then this is great. If you want a high tech tablet to do more and use for work then go for the Samsung tablets.  - Hope this helps anyone thinking of buying this.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: David Bu
Reviews.Content: This is nice product, looks like an iPad mini. It responds pretty fast.I called the support hotline for video/picture format issues. The lady was pretty nice and professional and she knows the product very well.I got a protective case in the local store and bring the tablet with me wherever I go.

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: Stefan Calin
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this tablet. Good picture quality and very responsive. It does what I need. The tech support was nice and helpful. I had a different experience than the previous review.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Logan Bauer
Reviews.Content: I've had a great experience with this tablet so far.  It runs fast, it's got a nice clear picture, and it's just the right size to fit in my bag.  It does everything I need it to.  All in all I'm very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: TIvax is junk
Reviews.Author: Jr&Ethansmom
Reviews.Content: Charger dock goes out very easily and only after 30 days. Customer service is a joke they claim that tablet was opened before so that they could avoid fulfilling the warranty then try to charge you to send the tablet back! TIvax does not care about their customers at all, just pawning off their junk for a quick buck.PS if you don't believe me search for reviews on other Tivax products.... I wish someone would have warned me.

Reviews.Title: Its of for the money.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Bleeker
Reviews.Content: I got it on sale on black Friday for my two yr old daughter.  It works just fine for her to play games on.

Reviews.Title: The Company SUCKS, OK tablet
Reviews.Author: dawnkegler
Reviews.Content: I bought this at Office Max and the sd card slot was broke so I contacted the company and they just said I'm not doing it write.If they look at it they have to charge me. Office max was told about the problem and let me return it.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Micah Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tablet and had to promptly return because the screen became distorted. We replaced it for a new one, which seemed to be working fine. But within a few days, it would not turn on at all. This tablet promises but fails to deliver.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet!
Reviews.Author: B. Bert
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great connectivity and great price! Made my decision to buy based on the reviews here and  I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: GEORGE
Reviews.Content: it comes have a white spot appearing on the screen ramdomly,please fix this problem im not satisfied!!!!..or change the tablet..

Reviews.Title: Good for what I need
Reviews.Author: Marlow Weaver
Reviews.Content: The tablet, is good, for what I need, mainly internet, e-mail and to be able to carry around easily.  Going on a trip to London, in August and it is convenient to travel with.  Do have a little trouble figuring out some of the features, but I'm sure I will get more knowledgeable soon.  In other reviews, it said the camera, was not the best, and they were right, but I did not get it for the camera feature.

Reviews.Title: Tivax MiTraveler 80D8w 8-Inch 8 GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: bobapa
Reviews.Content: The visible screws holding this tablet together give it a cheap look but unfortunately that is only part of the problem. The screen had a spot that would do the wave when holding the device. I sent it back for replacement and the next tablet had the exact same issue. It just doesn't feel good in the hand, not ergonomic. Do not buy

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: undergroundbos
Reviews.Content: I choose 5 stars because this tablet is a great purchase. No problems works great, nice clear screen to. I recommend this tablet to anyone looking for one at a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: sydb42
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought two of these to give to our children for Christmas.  Unfortunately, we did not see that a warranty plan was available that would cover drops/spills or I would have bought that too.  Our younger child dropped it after about a month and it cracked the screen in a way that made it unusable. :(  However, that's not the fault of the tablet, nor was that the first time it had been dropped without being in its cover.  The other tablet is still doing great with heavy usage (mainly games) by our older child.

Reviews.Title: Public Tranportation
Reviews.Author: Beamish Nine "Beamish"
Reviews.Content: Gave four (4) stars, because I am still in the process of learning it's many uses. The basic purchase: to be able to read books while using public transportation. This is exceptional for the original purpose.

Reviews.Title: Died in first 20 mins
Reviews.Author: 70sChild
Reviews.Content: When I opened this I thought "Wow, what a nicely built tablet."  It looks great, feels great.I purchased as a Christmas gift for my son.  I had started to preload it with some fun games.After 15 minutes the screen just died.  White line right across the screen and it wouldn't goaway.  I have to say Amazon was awesome about taking it back.  They sent a return labelimmediately and credited me for the full purchase as soon as the item was picked up.A very smooth buying experience.  Too bad it didn't pan out.

Reviews.Title: dissapointed
Reviews.Author: lindsey mejia
Reviews.Content: i had  it for a month and it was working fine.taking good  care of  it then the charger  quit working. Then my  apps disapearred a couple of days later.now it wont even turn on i didnt drop it or anything

Reviews.Title: Has some concerns
Reviews.Author: Bernie
Reviews.Content: While the tablet itself is priced right, some people may be annoyed with the lag that it experiences sometimes. I am one of those people. In addition, WIFI is sometimes disconnected at random and is annoying when it is buffering through a lengthy video. I do like that it has a lot of connections (micro USB, Micro HDMI, charger plugg-in that allows the micro USB to be available). I returned it and upgraded to the ACER Iconia 8". I will say the screen is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: SLOOOOOOW
Reviews.Author: Daisychick
Reviews.Content: Painfully slow and incompatible with pretty much EVERY application I tried to install from the Play store. Sent it back.

Reviews.Title: work vell
Reviews.Author: Jorge Paniagua Vargas
Reviews.Content: This item met all my expectations, I have no problem working around me very well satisfied with this purchase I recommend

Reviews.Title: An excellent value
Reviews.Author: Mark Miller
Reviews.Content: The extra inch of screen makes this clear to view. Very functional product that I have already recommended to others.

Reviews.Title: tivax mi traveler
Reviews.Author: carol newman
Reviews.Content: I love it, gives me the ability to use lots of apps without cluttering my laptop. The picture is clear and the navigation  is easy.

Reviews.Title: Malfunction
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The battery on this doesn't charge correctly or hold a charge.  Very frustrating.  Would not buy again.  Difficult to use.

Reviews.Title: a good price for what you get
Reviews.Author: J. Berndt
Reviews.Content: likes to shut down when in the middle of looking up stuff.  Did not come with a screen protector.  Perfect for the fast or even browsing of the web and e-mail.

Reviews.Title: the tablet
Reviews.Author: Rebertha Munroe
Reviews.Content: before I order dis tablet I read the other comments and the way they talk about the tablet made me buy it. After I received it and use it for a short period of time I realize that it wasn't all they  said it was and its very slow and the volume is very low. the camera isn't all  that.

Reviews.Title: WARNING!
Reviews.Author: Oliver N. Ward "pax man"
Reviews.Content: This device is a piece of crap! Keyboard function failed in the first minutes of test use! They probably will have me pay shipping on item. I think it must be a racket. If they sell an item they know will be returned over and over again they can make money just on the unrefunded shipping and handling!
